was transporting smuggled fireworks,
inspected the vehicle and discovered that on the
trunk and rear seats there were nine
public boxes containing a total of 162 boxes of
foreign-made fireworks weighing 250
kg. Subject confessed.  bought the above fireworks
in Cambodia and then brought them back to Vietnam to sell for
profit. By November 10, the border station at My
Quy Tay border gate had preserved all documents and
handed over the subject Nguyen Duy Anh to
Nguyen Duc Hue police for verification and investigation.
Regarding the act of transporting smuggled foreign fireworks
after going to karaoke, I was angry at the
shop's attitude and thought that the bar was charging
too much. A man used a gun to
threaten the staff in the shop, causing everyone to
panic about the suspect, Le Cong.  Lap, residing in
Ward 1, Vinh Long City, was
prosecuted and banned from leaving his residence to investigate the
act of disturbing public order
on October 22 after
drinking. Lap and three friends
approached karaoke.  At 1:00 a.m. on
October 23, he left. While
paying, the group divided the money to pay. At this time, they did
n't have enough money and were still 500,000 VND short,
so they called his wife to pay more. However,
after returning home, he heard his wife say  He paid
1 million VND, more than 800,000 VND, along with his
previous anger about the shop staff's attitude,
so he brought two
guns back to the shop, chased them, threatened to make
everyone panic, then fired a
shot.  got on the ground and left, afraid of being
discovered by the police, so he sent two
guns to his friend to hide. However, when the
police offered him a job, his friend
voluntarily surrendered two guns
and six bullets.
Le Cong Lap's behavior of disturbing public order is dangerous,
causing insecurity and order, and needs to be
strictly handled according to
regulations dated November 10. Kien Giang Provincial Police
coordinated with the Procuracy to

tens of billions of

with the construction volume of
other projects.  causing damage to the state budget

VND, which doctors at a hospital in the US
had just saved.  A
34-year-old man successfully survived thanks to a combination of
lung transplant and breast implant surgery. This was also the first time
doctors performed
this method. The surgery took place at
Northwestern Medicine Hospital in Chicago,
Illinois. The patient was  Mr. David Dav was
admitted with a severe lung infection.
Antibiotics were ineffective because
Berer encountered drug resistance. The
patient's lungs were filled with fluid and the
infection spread throughout the body on X-
ray. His lungs were completely white.
Bower's entire lung was so seriously infected that
the doctors were forced to remove it because they could not
find a lung to transplant immediately. They
installed an artificial lung outside the body.
However, because the chest cavity was empty, the
doctors temporarily  At the time of implanting a chest implant for
the patient to keep the heart functioning normally,
two doctors performed surgery to transplant and remove
the implant from patient C's chest cavity. The
surgery was successful and B was
discharged at the end of September.  Through
experts, it is hoped that this method can
be used in the future for
patients who need a lung transplant but cannot
find a new organ to replace it.

since 1954. Regan Street, located in the

celestial lighting installations.  The angel hanging along

spent two weeks creating the
sparkling angels on Regan Street for a
project of this scale. Dart is also  We have to
consider the environmental impact of our work.
We use about 300,000
light bulbs. One of the reasons we
use flickering light bulbs is because they
turn on and off, so we only use half the
energy.  Saving energy is
becoming more and more important for
many stores. 2023 is the year when
things start to return to normal after the
pandemic but they still face
competition from online commerce.
Shopping streets attach great importance
to creating emotions for customers and
during the year-end season there is nothing
more appropriate than a little Christmas magic
from twinkling lights
